contentrichtext.text: '''Xihe''' may refer to: ==Mythology== *[[Xihe (deity)]] (羲和), Chinese solar deity ==Places in China== *[[Xihe County]] (西和县), Gansu *[[Xihe District]] (细河区), Fuxin, Liaoning ;Towns *[[Xihe, Suizhou]] (淅河镇), in [[Zengdu District]], Suizhou, Hubei Written as "西河镇": *[[Xihe, Chongqing]], in [[Tongliang County]] *[[Xihe, Yongjing County]], Gansu *[[Xihe, Dabu County]], Guangdong *[[Xihe, Shaoguan]], in [[Wujiang District, Shaoguan]], Guangdong *[[Xihe, Guangxi]], in [[Mengshan County]] *[[Xihe, Heilongjiang]], in [[Keshan County]] *[[Xihe, Xiaogan]], in [[Xiaonan District]], Xiaogan, Hubei *[[Xihe, Hunan]], in [[Xinhua County]] *[[Xihe, Shaanxi]], in [[Pingli County]] *[[Xihe, Shandong]], in [[Zichuan District]], Zibo *[[Xihe, Chengdu]], in [[Longquanyi District]] Written as "溪河镇": *[[Xihe, Jiangsu]], in [[Huai'an District]], Huai'an *[[Xihe, Jilin]], in [[Shulan]] ;Townships (西河乡) *[[Xihe Township, Guizhou]], in [[Meitan County]] *[[Xihe Township, Fenyang]], Shanxi *[[Xihe Township, Yangcheng County]], Shanxi *[[Xihe Township, Nanbu County]], Sichuan *[[Xihe Township, Xide County]], Sichuan {{disambig}}
